channel.title: Screenings on IKMC
channel.description: Recent content in Screenings on IKMC

item.title: August 2024, Week 1
item.description: Welcome back to campus! We hope that your summer was fun - but it is now time to strap in for the new semester. To help you unwind after a week of shifting rooms and cleaning, we have three amazing movies lines up for the weekend; Stories about a deranged soldier, a misled dramatist, and a (very sad) musician. Woyzeck (1979) - FRIDAY (02-08-2024) Director: Werner Herzog Genre: Drama Run Time: 82 min
